feature.label: PexToolsFeature
feature.description: After this plugin is installed,the right click menu on any item in the Package Explorer should have three extra menu options 1. Open Command Window Here: Opens the Shell/Command Prompt with the current working directory set to the file's parent directory or the folder's path. 2. Open Folder: Opens a file explorer window with the directory chosen or the file's parent directory 3. Copy Path To Clipboard: Copies the absolute path of the file or folder into clipboard
